Package jpass.ui.action

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.SwingWorker<Void,​Void>
jpass.ui.action.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Future<Void>, RunnableFuture<Void>
public abstract class Worker
extends SwingWorker<Void,​Void>
Worker class for time consuming tasks. While the task is running, the main application is disabled, and a progress indicator is shown.
Author:
Gabor_Bata
